short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn a stake in the AI revolution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI is the most powerful technology of all time, and now you can earn a stake in its development!

Spark is a network of over 2 million people that helps developers train artificial intelligence.  Once you install the Lite Node, it runs in the background of your computer and uses small amounts of unused internet bandwidth to view AI training data on the web. It can’t see any of your personal information or usage, it just takes data from public websites and sells it to AI companies.  And you get rewarded for helping!

Spark is fully compliant with all cybersecurity testing standards through continuous monitoring by AppEsteem, the world’s leading provider of cybersecurity certification. Additionally, Spark is a core contributor to the Anti-Malware Testing Standards Organization (AMTSO), which develops the standards for cybersecurity and anti-malware solutions.

Spark only uses a tiny fraction of unused bandwidth, so you’ll never experience any reduction in the speed or quality of your own internet activity.  Just download, sign up, and watch the rewards roll in.

Key Features:

1. Earn As You Surf: Acquire Spark Points as you continue to browse and share resources, opening up a world of exclusive rewards.

2. User-Friendly Interface: With just a few clicks, you can activate Spark, monitor your points, and manage your preferences.

3. Secure and Transparent: We prioritize user privacy and security. Spark never accesses personal data, and its resource usage is transparently displayed at all times. Spark is continuously monitored through AppEsteem which ensures ongoing and full compliance with cybersecurity regulations.

AI is poised to change our entire world, and its value should be distributed fairly. Install Spark today and turn your browsing into a rewarding experience.

Please refer to our FAQ or contact our support team if you have any questions or need further assistance.
